root.name: The Fast and The Furious: Super Bikes
root.description: SIMILARITY TO THE CRUIS'N SERIESThis game, like the Fast and the Furious car-racing game, has many stylistic and technological similarities to the Cruis'n series. In many respects this is a thematic continuation of the series, although by a different publisher (Raw Thrills). PLAYER RECORDSLike Cruis'n Exotica, the arcade version of this game uses a number pad for players to enter a unique code to keep track of their records. This system allows players to maintain persistent upgrades to their vehicles.
